text: Now three days after Festus arrived in the province, he went up to Jerusalem from Caesarea.

<st data-num="5037" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="749" class="">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">most prominent men</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1718">brought formal charges</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="154" class="">Requesting</st> him to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> them a <st data-num="5485" class="">favor</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3870">urged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Festus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3704">to</st> <st data-num="3343" class="">summon</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="1747">planning an ambush</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="337" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="5347" class="">Festus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st> that <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> was being <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2542" class="">Caesarea</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161">and</st> he <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="3195" class="">intended</st> to <st data-num="1607" class="">go</st> there<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722 5034">shortly</st>.
“So,” he said, “let your leaders go down there with me, and if this man has done anything wrong, they may bring charges against him.”
After Festus had stayed not more than eight or ten days among them, he went down to Caesarea, and the next day he sat on the judgment seat and ordered Paul to be brought.

When <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">arrived</st>, the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> who had <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="4026">stood around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2702" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="926" class="">serious</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="157" class="">charges</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> they were <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="584" class="">prove</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="626">said in</st> his <st data-num="626" class="">defense</st>,<n id="1" /> “I have <st data-num="264" class="">committed</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">no</st> <st data-num="264" class="">offense</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st>.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5347" class="">Festus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanting</st> to <st data-num="2698">do</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> a <st data-num="5485" class="">favor</st>, <st data-num="3004">asked</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, “Are you <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="305">go up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st> and be <st data-num="2919" class="">tried</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778">these charges</st>?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2541">Caesar’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="968">judgment seat</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">should</st> be <st data-num="2919" class="">tried</st>.<n id="4" /> I have <st data-num="91" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="91" class="">wrong</st><n id="5" /> to the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">very well</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> I am in the <st data-num="91" class="">wrong</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="4238" class="">done</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> that <st data-num="514" class="">deserves</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3868">trying to escape</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dying</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2723" class="">charges</st> against <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> is true,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="5483" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5483" class="">over</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="4" /> I <st data-num="1941" class="">appeal</st> to <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st>!”<n id="5" />
Then, after conferring with his council, Festus replied, “You have appealed to Caesar; to Caesar you will go!”
After several days had passed, King Agrippa and Bernice arrived at Caesarea to pay their respects to Festus.

<st data-num="5613" class="">While</st><n id="1" /> they were <st data-num="1304" class="">staying</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="4183">many</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="5347" class="">Festus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="394" class="">explained</st> <st data-num="3972">Paul’s</st> <st data-num="3588 2596">case</st> to the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> to get his opinion,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “There <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="2641" class="">left</st> here as a <st data-num="1198" class="">prisoner</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5344" class="">Felix</st>.

When <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1718" class="">informed</st><n id="2" /> me about <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="154" class="">asking for</st> a sentence of <st data-num="2613">condemnation</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

I <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> them<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="1485" class="">custom</st> of the <st data-num="4514" class="">Romans</st> to <st data-num="5483" class="">hand over</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4250" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2723" class="">accused</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> met his <st data-num="2725" class="">accusers</st> <st data-num="2596 4383">face-to-face</st><n id="3" /> and had been given<n id="4" /> an <st data-num="5117" class="">opportunity</st> to <st data-num="2983">make</st> a <st data-num="627" class="">defense</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="1462" class="">accusation</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> after <st data-num="846">they</st> <st data-num="4905" class="">came back</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">here</st> with me,<n id="1" /> I did <st data-num="3367">not</st> <st data-num="311" class="">postpone</st> the case,<n id="2" /> but the <st data-num="1836" class="">next day</st> I <st data-num="2523" class="">sat</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="968">judgment seat</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> to be <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st>.

When his <st data-num="2725" class="">accusers</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood up</st>, they did <st data-num="3762" class="">not</st> <st data-num="156" class="">charge</st><n id="1" /> him with <st data-num="3739">any</st> of the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil deeds</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> had <st data-num="5282" class="">suspected</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161">Rather</st> they had several <st data-num="2213">points of disagreement</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> their <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="1175" class="">religion</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">man</st> named <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" /> who was <st data-num="2348" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="5335" class="">claimed</st><n id="4" /> to be <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st>.

Because <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="639">was at a loss</st><n id="1" /> how <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> could <st data-num="2214" class="">investigate</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these matters</st>,<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> he were <st data-num="1014" class="">willing</st> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="2546" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="2919" class="">tried</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2546" class="">there</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778">these charges</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1941" class="">appealed</st> to be <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> in <st data-num="5083" class="">custody</st> for the <st data-num="1233" class="">decision</st> of <st data-num="4575" class="">His Majesty the Emperor</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to be <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> under guard <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> I could <st data-num="375" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st>.”<n id="2" />
Agrippa said to Festus, “I would also like to hear the man myself.” “Tomorrow,” he replied, “you will hear him.”

So the next day Agrippa and Bernice came with great pomp and entered the audience hall, along with the senior military officers and the prominent men of the city. When Festus gave the order, Paul was brought in.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="5347" class="">Festus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="935">King</st> <st data-num="67" class="">Agrippa</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> you who are <st data-num="4840">present here with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, you <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="537" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="4128" class="">populace</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1793" class="">petitioned</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">here</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="994">shouting loudly</st><n id="7" /> that <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">ought</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="3371">any longer</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2638" class="">found</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="4238" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st> that <st data-num="514" class="">deserved</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1941" class="">appealed</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4575">His Majesty the Emperor</st>,<n id="3" /> I <st data-num="2919" class="">decided</st> to <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> him.<n id="4" />

But I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100 3756">nothing</st> <st data-num="804" class="">definite</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> to my <st data-num="2962" class="">lord</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> I have <st data-num="4254" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> all, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3122" class="">especially</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="935" class="">King</st> <st data-num="67" class="">Agrippa</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3708">so that</st> after this <st data-num="351" class="">preliminary</st> hearing<n id="5" /> I may <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> to <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st>.
For it seems unreasonable to me to send a prisoner without clearly indicating the charges against him.”
